tool_description: Evaluates temperature readings against food safety regulations and HACCP standards to identify compliance violations.

log_id.description: Temperature log entry identifier to check

food_category.description: Food type: dairy, meat, poultry, seafood, produce, frozen, dry_goods

storage_duration.description: How long food has been at current temperature in minutes

critical_control_point.description: Whether this is a critical control point requiring strict monitoring

error_messages: Invalid log_id: Log entry not found or identifier format incorrect.
Invalid food_category: Must be one of [dairy, meat, poultry, seafood, produce, frozen, dry_goods].
Invalid storage_duration: Duration must be a positive integer representing minutes.
Invalid regulation_standard: Must be one of [FDA, USDA, local_health_dept].
Missing temperature data: Cannot perform compliance check without valid temperature reading.
usage: Provide log_id of temperature reading, specify food_category and storage_duration. Optionally set regulation_standard and critical_control_point flag for enhanced checking.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance result: compliant, warning, violation

violation_type.description: Type of violation if non-compliant: temperature_abuse, time_limit_exceeded, danger_zone

severity_level.description: Risk level: low, medium, high, critical

recommended_action.description: Suggested corrective action if violation detected
